titles.title: No Firearms for Foreign Felons Act of 2009
A bill to establish and clarify that Congress does not authorize persons convicted of dangerous crimes in foreign courts to freely possess firearms in the United States.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/28/2009--Introduced. No Firearms for Foreign Felons Act of 2009 - Amends the federal criminal code to prevent any individual convicted of a felony or crime of domestic violence in a foreign court from possessing a firearm in the United States.
